Problem Sets:

Brian Conrad's lecture course will be accompanied by a series of problem sets designed for those students who are not assigned to a project and do not wish to join one informally. Bryden Cais (Michigan) will serve as a TA for participants working on the problem sets. File '/u2/website/swc/www_source/aws/2007/speakers/conrad/project.html' not found.
